p: The quality of the four materials has been investigated by considering the XPS percentages obtained for the C1s, in terms of the Csp 2/Csp 3 ratio and the content of oxygen functionalities from the graphene surface ( Table S1). The results show a better quality for the carbon materials prepared by the 24 h ball milling procedure (the highest Csp 2/Csp 3 ratio and the lower quantity of oxygen functionalities on the graphene surfaces).
